entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Delta
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the morning. Wind becoming south 30 km/h near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low minus 10.
